mapper.sql: Emp_Id, Dept_Id, Position_Id, Enterprise_Id, UserImg, IndividualImg, JobNumber, Emp_Name, Emp_Sex, Emp_Phone, E_mail, Birthday, Remarks, Address, EmpState, Passwords, Addname, AddTime, UpdateName, UpdateTime, DeleteName, DeleteTime, LoginState, Education, Graduate
mapper.select: select e.Emp_Id, e.Dept_Id, e.Position_Id, e.Enterprise_Id, e.UserImg, e.IndividualImg, e.JobNumber, e.Emp_Name, e.Emp_Sex, e.Emp_Phone, e.E_mail, e.Birthday, e.Remarks, e.Address, e.EmpState, e.Passwords, e.Addname, e.AddTime, e.UpdateName, e.UpdateTime, e.DeleteName, e.DeleteTime, e.LoginState, e.Education, e.Graduate ,d.Dept_Id,d.Dept_Name, p.Position_Id,p.Position_Name,et.Enterprise_Id,et.Enterprise_Name from emp e inner join dept d on e.Dept_Id=d.Dept_Id inner join position p on e.Position_Id=p.Position_Id inner join enterprise et on e.Enterprise_Id = et.Enterprise_Id where p.Position_Name='班主任' and e.EmpState=0

select e.Emp_Id, e.Dept_Id, e.Position_Id, e.Enterprise_Id, e.UserImg, e.IndividualImg, e.JobNumber, e.Emp_Name, e.Emp_Sex, e.Emp_Phone, e.E_mail, e.Birthday, e.Remarks, e.Address, e.EmpState, e.Passwords, e.Addname, e.AddTime, e.UpdateName, e.UpdateTime, e.DeleteName, e.DeleteTime, e.LoginState, e.Education, e.Graduate ,d.Dept_Id,d.Dept_Name, p.Position_Id,p.Position_Name,et.Enterprise_Id,et.Enterprise_Name from emp e inner join dept d on e.Dept_Id=d.Dept_Id inner join position p on e.Position_Id=p.Position_Id inner join enterprise et on e.Enterprise_Id = et.Enterprise_Id where p.Position_Name='教员' and e.EmpState=0

select e.Emp_Id, e.Dept_Id, e.Position_Id, e.Enterprise_Id, e.UserImg, e.IndividualImg, e.JobNumber, e.Emp_Name, e.Emp_Sex, e.Emp_Phone, e.E_mail, e.Birthday, e.Remarks, e.Address, e.EmpState, e.Passwords, e.Addname, e.AddTime, e.UpdateName, e.UpdateTime, e.DeleteName, e.DeleteTime, e.LoginState, e.Education, e.Graduate ,d.Dept_Id,d.Dept_Name, p.Position_Id,p.Position_Name,et.Enterprise_Id,et.Enterprise_Name from emp e inner join dept d inner join position p inner join enterprise et where e.Dept_Id=d.Dept_Id and e.Position_Id=p.Position_Id and e.Enterprise_Id = et.Enterprise_Id

select e.Emp_Id, e.Dept_Id, e.Position_Id, e.Enterprise_Id, e.UserImg, e.IndividualImg, e.JobNumber, e.Emp_Name, e.Emp_Sex, e.Emp_Phone, e.E_mail, e.Birthday, e.Remarks, e.Address, e.EmpState, e.Passwords, e.Addname, e.AddTime, e.UpdateName, e.UpdateTime, e.DeleteName, e.DeleteTime, e.LoginState, e.Education, e.Graduate ,d.Dept_Id,d.Dept_Name, p.Position_Id,p.Position_Name,et.Enterprise_Id,et.Enterprise_Name from emp e inner join dept d inner join position p inner join enterprise et where e.Dept_Id=d.Dept_Id and e.Position_Id=p.Position_Id and e.Enterprise_Id = et.Enterprise_Id and Emp_Name like #{likeke}
mapper.delete: update emp set EmpState = 1,LoginState =1 where Emp_Id = #{empId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and EmpState = 0
mapper.insert: insert into emp (Emp_Id, Dept_Id, Position_Id, Enterprise_Id, UserImg, IndividualImg, JobNumber, Emp_Name, Emp_Sex, Emp_Phone, E_mail, Birthday, Remarks, Address, Addname, UpdateName, UpdateTime, DeleteName, DeleteTime, Education, Graduate ) values (#{empId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deptId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{positionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{enterpriseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userimg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{individualimg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jobnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{empName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{empSex,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{empPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eMail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deletename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deletetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{education,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{graduate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update:
update emp set Dept_Id = #{deptId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Position_Id = #{positionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Enterprise_Id = #{enterpriseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, UserImg = #{userimg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IndividualImg = #{individualimg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JobNumber = #{jobnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Emp_Name = #{empName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Emp_Sex = #{empSex,jdbcType=CHAR}, Emp_Phone = #{empPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, E_mail = #{eMail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, Remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EmpState = #{empstate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Passwords = #{passwords,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UpdateName = #{updatename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UpdateTime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DeleteName = #{deletename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DeleteTime = #{deletetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LoginState = #{loginstate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Education = #{education,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Graduate = #{graduate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where Emp_Id = #{empId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
update emp set EmpState = 1, LoginState =1, DeleteName = #{deletename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},DeleteTime = #{deletetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where Emp_Id = #{empId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and EmpState = 0
